plot: Slug follows a counterfeit five dollar bill as it weaves its way through circulation, in and out of the interconnected lives of a group of Halifax suburban youths.
title: Slug
plot_es: Slug follows a counterfeit five dollar bill as it weaves its way through circulation, in and out of the interconnected lives of a group of Halifax suburban youths.
plot_en: Slug follows a counterfeit five dollar bill as it weaves its way through circulation, in and out of the interconnected lives of a group of Halifax suburban youths.
